definition: to bear/to endure/to tolerate/to restrain oneself

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, US comic book series, first appeared in 1984, also films, video games etc
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (Tw)/see 忍者神龜|忍者神龟[Ren3 zhe3 Shen2 gui1]

sentences.english: Discover the magical world of Mini Ninjas, and play one of the 3 ninja games.
sentences.chinese: 迷你忍者发现了魔法世界，发挥忍者的3场比赛之一。

sentences.english: Discover the magical world of Mini Ninjas, and play one of the 3 ninja games.
sentences.chinese: 迷你忍者发现了魔法世界，发挥忍者的3场比赛之一。

sentences.english: Incarnated one of your favorite heroes from naruto in a battle to defend you village.
sentences.chinese: 从火影忍者中挑出您最喜爱的英雄，保卫你的村落。

sentences.english: Thanks fro that O, NEAL, Hey, you go and take them out with your Ninjas .
sentences.chinese: 由于来回的约尼尔，嘿，你去和他们与您的忍者。

sentences.english: I love naruto . Especially vortex naruto .
sentences.chinese: 我爱火影忍者，尤其是漩涡鸣人。

sentences.english: Who was your favourite Ninja Turtle?
sentences.chinese: 你最喜欢的忍者神龟是谁？

sentences.english: But didn't you tell him how weird things have gotten with the Turtles?
sentences.chinese: 但是你跟他说了忍者神龟们变的多奇怪了吗？

sentences.english: Obviously, Ninja will be an assassinator .
sentences.chinese: 显然，忍者将会是一个杀手角色。

sentences.english: The only restaurant in the world where Ninjas serve you.
sentences.chinese: 全球唯一一家由日本忍者做服务员的餐厅。

sentences.english: Focusing his Ki, the Ninja uses momentum to strike the enemy with tremendous force.
sentences.chinese: 忍者可以集中“技”对敌人发动强击。

sentences.english: I was slowly becoming a real food ninja in the super market.
sentences.chinese: 在超市，我逐渐修炼成了一名真正食物的忍者神龟。
此外，忍者就是我们的家人。

sentences.english: Learn the history of ninjutsu in this free video clip from a master ninja.
sentences.chinese: 学习忍术在此免费视频剪辑的历史，从主忍者。

sentences.english: Ok guys for fans of naruto, here a cloaks with pictures.
sentences.chinese: 确定家伙火影忍者的球迷，在这里用图片的斗篷。

sentences.english: Select your NG2 display picture under "Frequently used display pictures" .
sentences.chinese: 选择你喜欢的《忍者外传2》显示图片即可。

sentences.english: Needless to say, it is powerful enough to slice a watermelon effortlessly like Fruit Ninja.
sentences.chinese: 而且它切西瓜时的刀法就像是水果忍者。

definition: Orochimaru, Japanese folktale hero/Orochimaru, character in the Naruto manga series
straight or circular throwing-knife used by ninja and samurai (loanword from Japanese 手裏剣 shuriken)
bushidō or way of the warrior, samurai code of chivalry
berserker (Norse warrior or fantasy role-playing character)
Asura, malevolent spirits in Indian mythology
Yamata no Orochi, serpent with eight heads and eight tails from mythological section of Nihon Shoki (Chronicles of Japan)
